name: Blueprint Template
description:
Blueprint template


What is a blueprint?

A blueprint is a generic diagram used to visualize the high-level architecture of an application. A good blueprint should show the main components and the interrelationships between them.


Why would you use a blueprint?

A blueprint is here to help us understand what we need to build at a high level:

  • Which views will we need in this application?
  • Which frontend elements will each view contain?
  • How does one go from one view to another?
  • etc.


Additionally, once the blueprint is completed, you should be able to create a first database schema for your app.
